title: Strengthening Data Science Practice Competencies: Public Administration and Democratic Practice: Service-Learning-Based Leadership Development

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can propose conflict resolution strategies within organizations by applying democratic decision-making processes

Learners will select one community issue (traffic congestion or waste segregation) and develop a service-learning project proposal applying AI technology (image classification or predictive analytics). The proposal must include problem definition, AI solution architecture, a 2-week implementation plan (with milestones), and projected outcome metrics, meeting ≥4 of 5 evaluation rubric criteria upon submission
Learners can analyze citizen participation and community development strategies required in public administration according to evaluation criteria

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
